amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas

description:
As Aspen’s only Forbes Five Star, AAA Five Diamond, ski-in, ski-out property, The Little Nell offers its guests a residential feel with a modern “Aspen Aesthetic” design. All of the 92 spacious guest rooms, which include 11 suites and three signature suites, feature Holly Hunt’s exclusive Studio H Furnishings. Guests stay in the lap of luxury with sumptuous bedding, plentiful mini-bars, gas-burning fireplaces, luxurious baths and breathtaking views.   
Both Element 47 and Ajax Tavern feature the finest locally sourced ingredients, expertly prepared by creative and conscientious chefs. Their wine cellar is a consistent winner of the Wine Spectator Grand Award and is presided over by renowned and knowledgeable sommeliers.   Even après-ski is elevated to new heights at the Little Nell. Casual with a touch of refinement, Chair 9 is the perfect spot to belly up after a full and satisfying day on Aspen Mountain’s slopes. DJs and live music abound at this new Aspen hotspot and will not disappoint those looking to "cut a rug". The menu features everything from freshly shucked oysters to signature cocktails, a wide variety of wines and champagnes and even a $4 “shot of the day.”   
The body and soul will find additional soothing comforts in the onsite fitness room, massage/facial treatment rooms, Jacuzzi and heated outdoor pool.   
Guests looking for a little more privacy and room to spread out on their Aspen ski vacation should consider a stay at the exclusive Residences at The Little Nell. Located next to the Silver Queen Gondola, these 3 and 4 bedroom, 2,500 to 4,450-square-foot residences offer unrivaled Aspen ski-in, ski-out access, plus all the comforts and conveniences you can expect from The Little Nell. Featuring custom furnishings and handcrafted interior finishes as well as large exterior decks and balconies, no details are overlooked at The Residences at The Little Nell.
name: Little Nell Hotel

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas
Less than 250 yards to the lifts
Walk to shuttle for lift access

description:
Located at the base of Aspen Mountain, St. Regis Aspen Resort is situated between the mountain's two primary ski lifts and within walking distance to all of Aspen's shops, restaurants and entertainment. The hotel sets the standard for personalized service and relaxed luxury, characteristic of Aspen.  

As you would expect from the St. Regis Aspen Resort, every guestroom and suite features indulgent amenities including signature pillow-top beds, down comforters and Pratesi linens. Expansive marble bathrooms are stocked with Remède bath amenities and plush bathrobes.   

The signature St. Regis Butler Service has been a treasured hallmark of the St. Regis experience for more than a century, and the Aspen resort’s Ski Butlers make the transition from guestroom to ski slope seamless. They assist with ski and snowboard equipment, instruction and transportation to the ski mountain of the guest's choice.   
End the day with our champagne sabering ritual and dinner in Chefs Club by FOOD & WINE, featuring contemporary American Cuisine highlighting FOOD & WINE "Best New Chefs". Finish the evening with a nightcap in the Shadow Mountain Lounge or with local live music and fresh s'mores by the outdoor fire pit.
name: St Regis Aspen Resort

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas

description:
The Gant is Aspen Colorado’s premier condominium resort, and provides the comforts of home with the services of a fine hotel, all within a world-class destination. The Gant is perfectly located just blocks away from downtown Aspen, which offers more than 300 shops, restaurants, bars and nightclubs.   

Accommodations range from standard-, deluxe- or premier-rated 1 to 4 bedroom condominiums, and guest amenities at the Gant include valet parking, bell and concierge service, complimentary airport and in-town transportation. The Gant is also the only full-service condominium resort in Aspen to offer on-property food and beverage service with Pepperjack’s Cafe.   

Celebrating 40 years of hospitality and meeting excellence, the Gant’s renovated Molly Campbell Conference Center elevates the Aspen meeting experience with a suite of distinctive amenities and services, including a panoramic rooftop terrace, a new specialty café, expanded flexible indoor and outdoor floor plans and contemporary new furnishings and accessories.
name: Gant Condominiums

amenities.value: Less than 250 yards to the lifts
Walk to shuttle for lift access

description:
Ideally located in the heart of downtown Aspen, Colorado, the Aspen Square Condominium Hotel combines gracious, professional service with outstanding amenities, including full concierge and front-desk services, bell staff, daily housekeeping, heated outdoor swimming pool, two hot tubs, fitness center, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi access and free parking. Aspen Mountain’s Silver Queen Gondola is just across the street from the hotel, and all of Aspen’s renowned restaurants, unique shops and eclectic art galleries are within easy walking distance.   

Aspen Square offers cozy fireplace studios and 1, 2 and 3 bedroom condominiums, all with flexible bedding options to suit your traveling needs. All accommodations include a fully equipped kitchen, wood-burning fireplace, air conditioning and a private balcony with scenic mountain views in every direction.
name: Aspen Square Condominium Hotel

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas
Walk to shuttle for lift access

description:
Experience the rebirth of an Aspen Icon. Limelight Hotel Aspen is a brand new hotel in downtown Aspen that is perfect for family- group- and international travel as well as corporate retreats- and year-round leisure vacations. Our centrally located property features cozy public space and well-appointed accommodations at a reasonable price as well as the warmth and hospitality of a family-owned hotel. 

This state-of-the-art facility includes climate control throughout- underground parking- ski lockers and everything guests need to get the most from their stay. One thing that has not changed is our signature service. Enjoy the classic warmth of our hospitality with the conveniences of modern living- such as wireless Internet and a delicious breakfast to get your day started. With our rich family history- we pride ourselves in providing unmatched service and value. 

Whether you choose the comfort of a standard guest room with a comfy king-sized bed or the spacious luxury of a two-bedroom condo with a full kitchen and private terrace- you will find that our accommodations are a magical blend of rustic inn comfort and modern convenience. We designed our new guest rooms to be both comfortable and functional- with enough space for groups and gear. 

Families will love the ease of our pet-friendly suites and condos- which feature a pull-out couch for added sleeping space. If you have got corporate clients to impress or a group retreat to host- the Limelight Lodge has thoughtful amenities such as kitchenettes- fireplaces- and wireless high-speed Internet access to keep people comfortable and connected during their stay. 

All rooms also feature in-room movies and games. Small conveniences such as an iron and ironing board are great if you have to look your best for an Aspen meeting or social event. Balconies with incredible views are also available- so choose your perfect accommodations with us and start enjoying the fresh beauty of Aspen.
name: Limelight Hotel Aspen

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas

description: Conveniently located in the heart of Aspen this landmark hotel is renowned for its relaxed elegance gracious hospitality and authentic mountain spirit. Guests enjoy distinguished accommodations acclaimed dining rejuvenating spa services and the modern amenities of a world-class luxury boutique hotel.
name: Hotel Jerome - Auberge Resort

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas
Less than 250 yards to the lifts
Walk to shuttle for lift access

description: The Sky Hotel is a boutique Hotel located right at the base of Aspen Mountain. Funky décor throughout and a cool après ski scene, make the hotel especially popular among the urban crowd. Downtown Aspen's Sky Hotel also provides these fabulous amenities to make your stay complete; flat-screen TVs, high-speed internet access, Frette bed linens, plush down comforters and pillows, fully stocked honor bar (including bottled oxygen), direct dial telephones with voicemail and computer dataports, pet friendly guest rooms, room service is available for breakfast, lunch and dinner, complimentary newspaper, morning coffee and tea service and daily housekeeping service. Complimentary on-site cardio room with treadmills, stationary bikes and elliptical trainer available to guests 24 hours a day.
name: Sky Hotel

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas

description:
Situated on Main Street and very convenient to the free skier’s bus, the Aspen Mountain Lodge provides ski vacationers with easy access to Aspen Mountain’s slopes and downtown Aspen. While staying at the Aspen Mountain Lodge, guests are treated to comfortable beds, crisp white linens, daily continental breakfast, an après-ski wine and cheese party throughout the winter and great views—many of the rooms offer mountain views from balconies and private decks.   The Lodge’s spacious common room features a beautiful stone fireplace, making it great place to warm up after the day on the slopes and recount the day’s adventures with friends and family.   The lodge has 38 tastefully decorated rooms spread out over four floors. All rooms in the lodge are approximately 288 square feet and each floor offers a different experience.   The garden level rooms are budget-friendly and convenient to the common area. The upper level rooms, located on the second and third floors, provides a quieter setting. Balcony rooms offer beautiful mountain views from the third and fourth floors. Guests staying in the deluxe rooms will enjoy mountain views as well, more privacy and special amenities, including king-sized beds, en suite Jacuzzi tubs and private decks.   
No matter which room you’re staying in at the Aspen Mountain Lodge, you can enjoy a relaxing soak in the outdoor heated pool and hot tub after a great day of skiing or snowboarding.
name: Aspen Mountain Lodge

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas
Walk to shuttle for lift access

description:
The Inn at Aspen will exceed your expectations. The modern lobby features a 24-foot-high grand entryway with floor-to-ceiling windows, which offer center-stage views of the slopes. Providing the only ski-in, ski-out access at Buttermilk, the Inn at Aspen is perfect for those who want a quieter atmosphere
without sacrificing location. A gas fire pit and patio, just across from the entryway, provide a perfect setting for enjoying the warm Colorado sunshine and watching skiers schuss down the mountain. Additionally, the property looks right out onto the Hideout Kid’s Learning Center, which makes it one of the best properties in the Aspen Snowmass area for families.   Accommodations range from single or double queen or king hotel rooms to studios with kitchenettes. After a day on the slopes, guests can belly-up to the lobby bar for drinks and snacks, soak in the outdoor hot tub or pool or relax in the steam room. Additional onsite amenities include a courtesy airport shuttle, health club, and 24-hour front desk.
name: Inn at Aspen

description:
A contemporary classic, the Hotel Aspen offers you affordable comfort just a short stroll from all that Aspen has to offer. Rooms feature king or queen size beds, some offer a fireplace or private outdoor hot tub. 
  
Located on Main Street, the Hotel Aspen is within walking distance of the Mall, Music Tent, and is on the shuttle bus route to all other activities and ski areas.
  



Room Descriptions: 

Deluxe Rooms: Featuring king or queen-zise beds, with 300 thread count down comforters. Rooms also include a desk or workspace, 32" LCD TV, DVD player and signature Hotel Aspen Italian terry robes.
  
Fireplace Suite: All the amenities as the Deluxe Rooms plus a fireplace.  


Jacuzzi Room: All the amenities as the Deluxe Rooms plus a 2 person Jacuzzi tub.
  

Additional room amenities include a wet bar, small refrigerator, coffee maker, microwave, flat screen TV, iron, ironing board, hairdryer, humidifier, DVD, iPod alarm clock, and air conditioning. Most rooms open onto terraces or balconies. In the lounge, you can enjoy incredible panoramic views with your afternoon wine and cheese buffet during the ski season.
name: Hotel Aspen

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas

description: The Molly Gibson Lodge is centrally located in Aspen with world class shopping, dining, entertainment and recreational activities just blocks away. The Molly Gibson Lodge offers a room style for every taste and budget in mind. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily, and the courtesy shuttle is on call for trips to the airport, town activities and to the gondola. In the winter, after a day of skiing, enjoy a drink by the fire in Molly’s Bar. Additional amenities include Flat TV, DVD, Ipod alarm clock. Some units offer a kitchen, fireplace or jetted tub
name: Molly Gibson Lodge

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas

description: The Mountain Chalet is one of the few remaining old-time ski lodges in Aspen. We proudly offer a comfortable visit at a good value.
name: Mountain Chalet Aspen

amenities.value: Walk to shuttle for lift access

description: No other condominium hotel in Aspen sits closer to the base of Aspen Mountain, the gondola and the heart of downtown Aspen's shopping and dining district. Each 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 bedroom condominium is individually decorated and categorized as Standard, Deluxe or Premier. All North of Nell units include a fully equipped kitchen, living room, private balcony, flat panel TVs and most offer a fireplace. To enhance your stay, complimentary amenities include daily maid-service, Wi-Fi, concierge, underground parking and John Roberts Gym passes. Most units have air conditioning.
name: North of Nell Condominiums

amenities.value: Walk to shuttle for lift access

description: The Prospector Condominiums are located in the heart of downtown Aspen, mere steps from shops, galleries and restaurants in the mall. The Aspen Mountain gondola is three blocks away, and the bus park, with free skier shuttles to the other three ski areas, is one block away. There is a park behind the property providing unobstructed views of Aspen Mountain from upper floor units.  During office hours van transportation is provided to and from the Aspen Airport. Additional amenities include TV, VCR, stereo, wet bar and microwave, the convenience of heated underground parking. The most enchanting aspect of the Prospector's location is your private hot tub on your own sundeck.
name: Prospector Condos

amenities.value: Walk to shuttle for lift access

description: The St Moritz Lodge and Condominiums offer a range of room configurations including European-style lodge rooms, kitchenette rooms and 1 and 2 bedroom condos. For the economy- minded traveler there are shared and private hostels with shared bathrooms. Appealing to Aspen vacationers looking to be close to everything at an affordable rate, The St. Moritz Lodge and Condominiums is located at the foot of Shadow Mountain in Aspen’s quiet West End neighborhood, just a few blocks from downtown Aspen and the lifts. The complimentary town bus stops just two blocks away.   Amenities include: continental breakfast (winter and summer seasons), après-ski parties, onsite parking, cable TV, small refrigerators, and outdoor barbecue grills.
name: St Moritz Lodge and Condominiums

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas

description: Boasting 40 sweeping acres and some of the most incredible views, Aspen Meadows Resort is located in the historic West End of Aspen and home to the acclaimed Aspen Institute. Full-services amenities include 24-hour complimentary shuttle service to and from the Aspen Airport as well as to downtown Aspen. The resort offers 98 spacious guest suites ranging from 600- to 1,200-square-foot units with kitchenettes, living areas with queen-size sleeper sofas and floor-to-ceiling windows.   Aspen Meadows also boasts an extensive health club, outdoor heated saline pool and hot tub, steam rooms, massage and spa services, snowshoe usage in the winter, 24-hour business center, two onsite art galleries and more.
name: Aspen Meadows Resort

amenities.value: Walk to shuttle for lift access

description:
The Hearthstone House offers guests a charming, intimate setting with the convenience of an ideal location in the heart of Aspen. Located only two blocks from the center of town, this Frank Lloyd Wright-inspired lodge is walking distance to world-class restaurants and shopping. The highly-acclaimed Hearthstone House has plush amenities and the finest furnishings and décor so guests feel comfortable relaxing in our luxurious surroundings.

Start the morning enjoying the complimentary extended continental breakfast while planning your day from the wide variety of outdoor and indoor activities available in the Aspen/Snowmass area. Unwind in the afternoon during our wine and cheese hour by the fire, soaking in our outdoor hot tub under the stars of Aspen or relaxing in our herbal steam room while you reminisce about your latest adventure.

This unique hotel is renowned for exceptional, old-world service. The gracious and friendly staff ensures that each guest experiences personalized service and is available to assist with any needs or requests. Hospitality is a quintessential trademark of the Hearthstone House and keeps guests coming back year after year. See why we were voted the #1 Bed and Breakfast in Aspen by Trip Advisor.

We invite you to spend your next visit to Aspen at the Hearthstone House!
name: Hearthstone House

description: Enjoy spectacular views from these comfortable condominiums. Located in the Aspen Club Health and Fitness Center complex. These three bedroom riverside or lakefront townhomes are among Aspen's finest. In addition to the amenities listed these condominiums also feature large master suites, parking and daily maid service.
name: Aspen Club Condos

description:
Aspen Townhouse East is located in a quiet residential neighborhood only two blocks from the Silver Queen Gondola and downtown Aspen.

 These two-level, 2- and 3-bedroom town houses range in rating from standard to deluxe. All units feature fully equipped kitchen, full bathrooms, cable TV (flatscreen HD available), free wireless internet and a deck.

 Many units have great views of Aspen Mountain!

 Complex amenities include free Aspen airport transfers, on-site free parking and laundry facilities.
name: Aspen Townhouse East

amenities.value: Less than 250 yards to the lifts

description: Chateau Chaumont has a perfect location, just one block from the high-speed Silver Queen Gondola. Guests can choose from two or three bedroom units. While staying at the Chaumont enjoy spectacular views of either Aspen Mountain or Red Mountain.  The Chateau's are perfect for families or groups. In addition to the amenities listed, this property also offers full kitchens and the complex has underground parking on a first come first serve basis. Take advantage of an ideal location while you stay at the Chateau Chaumont.
name: Chateau Chaumont

description: Chateau Eau Claire offers comfortable and spacious condominiums that are a perfect retreat in winter or summer. Located just a few blocks from Aspen Mountain, historic downtown Aspen and the free skier shuttle, which will take you to Snowmass, Highlands or Buttermilk Mountains.  In addition to the amenities listed, these units also offer a full kitchen, television and VCR, high speed internet access and there is also an executive boardroom available for small meetings. On site parking is just another feature that the makes the Chateau Eau Claire a comfortable and convenient place to stay while you are in Aspen.
name: Chateau Eau Claire

description: Offering stunning views of Aspen Mountain and located just two blocks from the Silver Queen Gondola, the Clarendon Condominiums feature three bedrooms, three bathroom town homes with fully equipped kitchens, high ceilings, private deck and off street parking. The convenient location allows for a short walk to the restaurants and shops of downtown Aspen.
name: Clarendon

description: Located on Main Street Aspen, these comfortably priced two bedroom condominiums are located only three blocks from the restaurants and shopping of downtown. In addition to the amenities listed, each condominium has a fully equipped kitchen, and fireplace. There is an elevator at the complex for your convenience. The Concept 600 condominiums boast great views of Aspen Mountain with some units offering balconies to enhance your experience.
name: Concept 600

description: Located just 3 blocks from the Wheeler Opera House in downtown Aspen, these moderately priced condominiums are comfortable and include a full kitchen, wood fireplace, coin laundry, limited off-street parking. Units are 2 blocks to the free shuttle and 10 blocks to the gondola.
name: Cottonwood

description: Located at the base of Aspen Mountain and just 3 blocks from the Silver Queen Gondola, the Dolomite Townhomes have one of the best locations in town. These townhomes offer spacious accommodations that make them perfect for hosting a group or family retreat. In addition to the amenities listed, each unit also offers a full kitchen. The Dolomite Villas are designed with a combination of light contemporary and traditional antique charm.
name: Dolomites

description: The Fifth Avenue's one to four-bedroom condominiums offer easy access to the great skiing, dining and nightlife of Aspen. The Fifth Avenue condominiums welcome guests with window views overlooking the gleaming town of Aspen, while Aspen Mountain itself lies right out your back door. There is a Pool and Hot Tub to relax in after an invigorating day on the slopes.  Fifth Avenue is located only 2.5 blocks downhill to the gondola and 2 blocks downhill to the free skiers shuttle. In addition to the amenities listed, each unit includes a full kitchen, fireplace and limited parking.
name: Fifth Avenue

description: Ideally located just 1 block from the Aspen Mountain Gondola, these condominiums offer a cozy atmosphere with full kitchen and fireplace.
name: Glory Hole

description: Located just 1.5 blocks from the Silver Queen Gondola and steps from downtown, Le Clairvaux, puts you in the center of all that Aspen has to offer. In addition to the amenities listed below, each condominium offers a full kitchen, on-site parking, and cable TV.
name: Le Clairvaux

amenities.value: Walk to shuttle for lift access

description: The Little Nell Condominiums are located just east of downtown, at the base of Aspen Mountain. Each unit is fully equipped to provide you with an enjoyable, comfortable stay. In addition to the amenities listed, the condominiums all have fully equipped kitchens, balconies and private off street parking.
name: Little Nell Condos

description: These condominiums are ideally located within walking distance to the ski lifts and shops and restaurants. Units include a full kitchen, TV, phone, wood or gas fireplace, coin laundry, underground parking.
name: 700 Monarch

description: The Old Hundred condominiums are just two blocks from the Silver Queen Gondola and all the restaurants, shops and nightclubs Aspen has to offer. There is private off street parking behind the units. These condominiums are uniquely designed in multi-level configurations. The Old Hundred condominiums also offer a fully equipped kitchen and fireplace.
name: Old Hundred

description: Located four blocks from the Silver Queen Gondola in Aspen; these one bedroom and one bath condominiums feature a fully equipped kitchen, living area with a wood-burning fireplace and TV. The condominiums are approximately 750 square feet, and offer mountain views and free parking.
name: Timber Ridge

amenities.value: Less than 250 yards to the lifts

description: Chateau Dumont has two and three bedroom condominiums in one of Aspen's best locations, only one block from the Silver Queen Gondola. In addition to the amenities listed, these units also include a full kitchen, TV, VCR or DVD, CD player and high speed internet access.
name: Chateau Dumont

amenities.value: Less than 250 yards to the lifts

description: The Independence Square is Aspen's only lodge that provides concierge and guest services in a central downtown location. Aspen's shops, restaurants, nightlife and free shuttle buses our located right out the front door.   This historic landmark lodge offers modern day convenience with amenities such as wireless internet, rooftop Jacuzzi, refrigerators and ski lockers. After an invigorating day on the slopes, a complimentary après-ski wine and cheese reception is available during the winter season.
name: Independence Square Lodge

description: Located on the east end of Aspen, with easy access to shopping and restaurants, the Chateau Snow brings with it all the comforts you would expect with condominium living. In addition to the amenities listed, each condominium includes a fully equipped kitchen, a living room with color TV, and boasts great views of Aspen Mountain.
name: Chateau Snow

description: Nestled along the banks of the Roaring Fork River, the Chateau Roaring Fork offers comfortable and spacious condominiums that are a perfect retreat in winter or summer. Located just a few blocks from Aspen Mountain, historic downtown Aspen and the free skier shuttle, which will take you to Snowmass, Highlands or Buttermilk Mountains.  In addition to the amenities listed these units also offer a full kitchen, television and VCR, high speed internet access and there is also an executive boardroom available for small meetings. On site parking is just another feature that the makes the Chateau Roaring Fork a comfortable and convenient place to stay while you are in Aspen.
name: Chateau Roaring Fork

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas

description:
Located in the heart of downtown Aspen, the Annabelle Inn possesses all the charms of a vintage European ski lodge, while offering all of the modern conveniences one would expect with a stay in Aspen. Enjoy the mountain views from the hot tub, a glass of wine by the fire, or speak with one of our experienced staff members about Aspen. 
FREE: Breakfast, Apres Ski, airport transfer (ASE), WiFi.

*NO RESORT FEES!*
Ranked #1 Lodge in Aspen on tripadvisor.
name: Annabelle Inn Aspen

description: Located at the base of Aspen Mountain, The St. Regis Resort Aspen is situated between the mountain's two primary base ski lifts, and within walking distance to all of Aspen's shops, restaurants and entertainment. The hotel delivers a benchmark of personalized service and the relaxed spirit of the Rocky Mountains, which includes airport check-in service.  As you would expect from the St. Regis Resort Aspen, every guestroom and suite features the most advanced entertainment and communication technology. Amenities in all guest rooms include fax machines, fully stocked refrigerated honor bars, marble bathrooms featuring double vanities, hair dryer, scale and telephone, St. Regis Signature Butler Service, flat screen TV with cable, first-run movies and children's games, individual heating and air conditioning controls, plush terry bathrobes, three telephones, with dual phone lines, Bose CD and DVD player.
name: St. Regis Residence Club

description: Located right in the heart of downtown Aspen, the Hyatt Grand Aspen offers the ultimate location. Thoughtful architectural details like French doors and panoramic windows render the units bright and inviting. Residences range in size from two, three and four bedroom condominiums. Generous floor plans offer large kitchens equipped with Viking appliances and granite countertops.  Amenities include: High speed internet access, Plasma TV, Around town shuttle service/ Aspen airport transportation, air conditioning, steam showers, jetted tubs, ski valet, heated swimming pool, outdoor hot tubs, and continental breakfast.
name: Hyatt Grand Aspen

description: Ute Condominiums are located on the east side of downtown Aspen, just a few short blocks to the Ajax Mountain gondola and Aspen’s downtown core with world-class dining, shopping, and nightlife. Features include a full kitchen, wireless internet, and one designated off-street parking space. There is a common area barbecue grill available.
name: Ute Condos

description: Conveniently located five blocks from Aspen Mountain's high-speed gondola. The Aspen Silverglo offers cozy, affordable accommodations within walking distance to everything Aspen has to offer. Additional amenities include TV/DVD, fully equipped kitchen, high speed interest access, free skier shuttle during ski season, small conference room and guest lounge, housekeeping service and on site office and check-in.
name: Silverglo

description: The Fasching Haus Condominiums are conveniently located just 2 blocks from Aspen’s Silver Queen Gondola and the heart of downtown Aspen. The property has an on-site front desk, and an outdoor pool and hot tub in the central courtyard area. The skier’s shuttle which takes you to Snowmass, Highlands or Buttermilk Mountain stops just a block and a half away at Rubey Park.
name: Fasching Haus

amenities.value: Walk to shuttle for lift access

description: The Durant Condominiums feature floor to ceiling windows in the living room offering nice views of Aspen and the surrounding mountains. Located just 1.5 blocks from the gondola and 2 blocks from the center of Aspen. All the shops, restaurants and nightlife Aspen is known for, are within a short walk. In addition to the amenities listed, these units include a full kitchen, fireplace in most units, and TV.
name: Durant

description: Obermeyer Place Condominiums are beautifully furnished, and include a gas fireplace, washer/dryer, underground parking, and wireless internet. Located about six blocks from the Aspen Mountain Gondola and four blocks from the center of Aspen, this is a convenient location for exploring the Aspen area.
name: Obermeyer Place

amenities.value: Less than 250 yards to the lifts

description:
Located a convenient two blocks from Aspen Mountain’s Silver Queen Gondola and 1.5 blocks from Lift 1A, the Alpenblick Townhomes offer much more than a center stage location to Aspen’s slopes. The well-appointed, Alpine-inspired 3- and 4-bedroom Alpenblick Townhomes provide all the comforts of home including decks, fireplaces, full kitchens and flat-screen HD TVs. The units are rated standard to luxury and are spread out over multiple levels. All townhomes feature master bedrooms with en suite master bathrooms.   

Alpenblick Townhomes are also located within close proximity to downtown Aspen’s shops, dining and entertainment, and just two blocks from the Rubey Park bus station, which provides skiers with free transportation to Aspen Highlands, Buttermilk and Snowmass.   

Other amenities include access to an outdoor heated pool and hot tub, free Aspen airport transfers, on-site free parking, ski lockers and complimentary Wi-Fi.
name: Alpenblick Townhomes

amenities.value: Walk to shuttle for lift access

description: Shadow Mountain Condos is every skier's delight. They offer ski-in/ski-out access to Aspen Mountain’s Lift 1A and are an exceptional value. Each condominium is completely furnished and boasts superb views of downtown Aspen and the glittering nightlife is just a short walk away.
name: Shadow Mountain Condos

description: This four-level 4-bedroom, 4.5-bath deluxe townhome features an open living area with an additional den/family room, and is only four blocks to the Silver Queen Gondola and downtown Aspen.   The top-floor master suite features a King-size bed, air conditioning, a walk-in closet, flatscreen TV, a Sony DVD player, a JVC stereo with CD, wireless internet and a telephone. The master bathroom features double vanities, a steam shower and jetted tub, and a steamer/heat lamp. The 2nd floor living area features a family room/den with a flat screen TV, wraparound sofa, an HP Office Jet All-In-One printer/copier, wireless internet and a powder room.   The main living area features a 6-person sectional sofa, air conditioning, a wood-burning fireplace, flat screen TV with a Sony DVD player, a Sony component stereo with a 5-disc CD changer, a Bose IPod station, a window sitting area, a formal dining area that seats eight people, and a deck with a large back yard and a Weber barbecue grill.   The first (ground) floor features two bedrooms, each with its own full bathroom with a shower and a heat lamp. Bedding is queen (2nd guest) and two full beds (3rd guest). There is also a spacious mud/entry area and a full laundry room with a washer, dryer and basin.   The basement-level features the guest master suite, which has it's own entry and guest master bathroom with marble countertops, a steam shower, dual vanities, and a jetted tub. The guest master also features a flats creen TV and DVD player, and a full-size pullout sofa that can accommodate two more guest, for a total of 10! Other amenities include free on-site parking, free Aspen airport transfers, and complimentary passes to either the Aspen Recreation Center (ARC) or Jean-Robert's gym.
name: Black Swan Home

amenities.value: Walk to shuttle for lift access

description: Located at the base of Aspen Mountain, this elegant three-bedroom, three-bathroom deluxe condominium is a vacationer's dream. With Lift 1A just outside the front door, this unit features modern decor, stainless steel appliances, gas fireplaces and flat-screen TVs.
name: Mountain Queen

description:
This majestic 6 bedroom, 5.5 bath luxury private home features an open living area with vaulted ceilings and views of Aspen Mountain. The home sits in a quiet residential neighborhood on the free local bus line that services all four area ski mountains: Aspen Mountain, Aspen Highlands, Buttermilk and Snowmass. This home is highlighted rich pine wood floors and a number of high-end luxury finishes, including antique furniture.  
Other amenities at this amazing private home include to top-floor deck and hot tub; a full deck with grill on the main level; a 6th bedroom with its own efficiency kitchen; an office; several gas fireplaces; jetted tubs and steam showers in the master and 1st guest; a media room with surround sound; full size wet bar; garage parking; grocery elevator; flat screen TV and free wireless internet access.
name: 101 Park Avenue Home

description: Riverview Condominiums are located 5 blocks from the downtown core of Aspen and about 9 blocks from the Aspen Mountain Gondola. A shuttle but stop is located 150 yards from the property. Amenities include a fully-equipped kitchen, wood-burning fireplace, deck, common outdoor hot tub and heated pool, and private parking.
name: Riverview

description: Aspen Log Cabin offers 2,230-square-feet, 3 bedrooms and 3.5 baths. Unobstructed views of Aspen Mountain are prevalent throughout this charming Aspen ski vacation home. Just outside the home is a walking and bike path that leads to downtown Aspen. The Roaring Fork River flows alongside, making this a peaceful getaway. Aspen Log Cabin features a private hot tub, an outdoor kitchen with a gas BBQ grill and a fire pit.
name: Aspen Log Cabin

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas

description:
Unwind at the Element Basalt-Aspen, located in the heart of the Roaring Fork Valley in Basalt, Colorado, just 24 miles from the Aspen Mountain Gondola Plaza. This Colorado retreat is the perfect location for a getaway during any season. Hiking, biking, skiing and fly fishing are just a few of the activities offered in the area.  
The guestrooms include fully- equipped kitchens, on open-flow living area, and spa-inspired bathrooms. Complimentary Wi-Fi, fitness center and an indoor heated pool complete the experience.
name: Element Basalt Aspen

description: Exquisite designs and luxury amenities define this private West Bleeker Home. Six bedrooms and five and a half bathrooms span four levels of living space, comfortably and lavishly accommodating up to fourteen guests. The interior features intricate woodwork, a sophisticated design and an elevator for easy access to all four floors. Adjacent to the entry way is an open living space with cozy couches and chairs, flat screen TV, hardwood floors, gas fireplace and vaulted ceilings that allow the space to fill with natural sunlight. A hallway with overhead skylights leads to the kitchen finished with rich wood cabinetry, high end stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and a breakfast island with bar seating. Multiple windows, overhead lighting and skylights keep the cook space light and bright and ample room allows for multiple cooks. Adjoining the kitchen is a formal dining area that has seating for eight.  The master suite is beautifully appointed with hardwood floors, a cozy fireplace, flat screen TV and an en suite bathroom with a steam shower and Jacuzzi tub. Five additional guest rooms offer king and queen size beds and two sets of bunk beds. In the bunk room you'll find a seating area and built in kitchenette for added convenience and late night snacks. Another kitchenette is built into the media room featuring a gorgeous stone fireplace and comfy chair perfect for sitting back and relaxing while watching a movie. The garage provides parking for one car and an outdoor seating area offers space to enjoy the beautiful outdoor scenery.  Located in Aspen’s historic West End, the home features views of downtown, which is only a few blocks down the road, and the surrounding mountains.
name: West Bleeker Home

amenities.value: Complimentary Internet access in public areas

description: Take in the views from your private balcony or deck and enjoy unrivaled privacy and slopeside access when staying at The Residences at The Little Nell. Featuring all the conveniences and amenities entitled to The Little Nell guests, no details or service is overlooked at the ski in, ski out Residences at The Little Nell. Located next to the Silver Queen Gondola, these 3 and 4 bedroom, 2,500 to 4,450-square-foot residences offer unrivaled Aspen ski access. Featuring gorgeous, mountain-style architecture and interior finishes, The Residences will delight those with a discerning eye and appreciation for luxurious ambiance. The Residences’ guests can enjoy the onsite fitness room, massage/facial treatment rooms, Jacuzzi and heated outdoor pool. Other amenities include 24-hour desk service, concierge services, ski concierge service and complimentary access to the Audi Test Drive Program– to name a few.
name: Little Nell Residences
